'''''Screamfest Horror Film Festival''''' is the largest horror [[film festival]] in the United States.<ref>[http://www.dreadcentral.com/news/36397/in-la-check-out-next-screamfest-night-mayhem ayhem]</ref> Some of the largest horror online publications have called it the "[[Sundance Film Festival|Sundance]] of Horror". Previously held at Loews Universal Studios Cinemas, [[Universal CityWalk]], the festival is now held annually at the prestigious Grauman's Mann Chinese 6 in [[Hollywood, Los Angeles, California|Hollywood]]. ''Screamfest'' premieres and showcases new work from American and international [[Independent film|independent]] horror filmmakers. In 2007 Screamfest discovered and premiered PARANORMAL ACTIVITY. Film entries are accepted in the categories of Best Feature, Directing, Cinematography, Editing, Special Effects and Musical Score. In addition, there are special categories for Best Animation, Best Short, Best Documentary and Best Student Film.
+
'''''Screamfest Horror Film Festival''''' is the largest horror [[film festival]] in the United States.<ref>[http://www.dreadcentral.com/news/36397/in-la-check-out-next-screamfest-night-mayhem ayhem]</ref> Some of the largest horror online publications have called it the "[[Sundance Film Festival|Sundance]] of Horror". Previously held at Loews Universal Studios Cinemas, [[Universal CityWalk]], the festival is now held annually at the prestigious Grauman's Mann Chinese 6 in [[Hollywood, Los Angeles, California|Hollywood]]. ''Screamfest'' premieres and showcases new work from American and international [[Independent film|independent]] horror filmmakers. Film entries are accepted in the categories of Best Feature, Directing, Cinematography, Editing, Special Effects and Musical Score. In addition, there are special categories for Best Animation, Best Short, Best Documentary and Best Student Film.
